Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi negah-e ruz va māh har ruz ke bāšad az urmazd tā anirān negah-e ruz va māh har dō ke bāšad az urmazd tā anirān negah-e ān ruz beguyand har māh ke bāšad negah-e ān māh beguyand tā sar

"āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi and then the negah (patron?) of the corresponding day and the month, both, the correpsonding day and month. They say any negah of the corresponding day --between the day Urmazd and the day Anirān -- and the negah of the corresponding month until the end."
